sczoytMRGHAMOgbnQZX9bQ.text: So the first time I had Steak N Shake was when my friend bought it for me while I was at home watching movies. So I have not experienced the service personally. But when I first saw my burger (the Jalapeno one), it wasn't very good-looking. I took one bite, hm, okay. I took another, actually biting into the meat and everything this time, and it was like a party in my mouth! It was delicious! I finished my burger before my friend, and I wanted another one! (Unfortunately my friend had only bought me one burger :[ ) So, 5 stars for the food!

Ae7hframAw8hzbnSJmzkoQ.text: It was my first time eating here! It was about 3-4am and I'm from California so you know I'm use to everything being open like 24/7! My guy friend and I are on a mission to find food, he see's how stress I am about getting some food in me cause I was so hungry and still on Cali. time! He brough me here- STEAK N SHAKE, man- I like the old-school diner feel to it, real cute. We walked in through the door and here was a loud waiter! I was like whoa? its so early in the morning and here he is acting crazy (I guess thats how you stay awake LOL) he seated us at the table and began asking us what we wanted, I said I didn't know since I've never been! He gave me a run-down of all his faves,so I said well- since you like it I might as well try it- so I ordered a chicken burger. Meal was also prepared by our waiter, it came out in a timely fashion (THANKS) He began talking to us and making us feel real comfortable, I swear he was HILARIOUS- such a comedian! He reminded me of Dave Chappelle (i'm serious).  Overall, the meal was incredibly awesome and next time I'm in Charlotte I will most definitely be coming back to this STEAK N SHAKE!.

AGdYZiVEEsIRkH94Bes6Qw.text: I don't know  what was better about this steak and shake, finding mold in my fries or finding what appeared to be bits of mayo in my water, and you want to know the best part! The bread is dry and stale! Come here only if your looking for bad service and expired food.

htB7-TYk9CG0bbzKEBN53Q.text: I really like their Western Burger and flavored fries! I know this Steak n Shake closed then reopened.  It seems to be a lot better now!

v2bv5RBOfd-esoMKYcfXeA.text: We've been there 4 times now in the last month. The last 2 times have killed it for us, we will never be back. We went through the drive through, and the girl at the window charged us twice for our order, then had to get a manager to void one. It's been 2 weeks and the charge still hasnt been reversed on our card. They also, got our order wrong. The last time, they completely forgot half of our food. Luckily, we checked the bag and went in, and the manager (same guy from the previous time) didn't even acknowledge us standing there, just walked over and handed us the missing bag of food and walked away. Horrible location, especially for overly greasy burgers. Go across the street to Cookout instead!

jrru2Hevi1EnkdxW2P_WOQ.text: Steak N Shake has the best service around. Upon walking in, you are immediately greeted by the waiters and waitresses who are so friendly, it's almost clingy at times. Good service and really yummy fried food. Greatest milkshakes around. Anywhere.

apMR89pe1EyWN-UKv0-kFg.text: Im new to the area and my family and I wanted to try something different for lunch, so we picked steak 'n shake. We went through the drive through so we could get home and get more work done, it took 15 mins to get our food, and we orders 3 meals. The service was horrible. We first got our shakes, I ordered a Peanut Butter shake.. I received a Vanilla shake with a couple of shavings of Peanut Butter on top of the whip cream, other than that I drank a Vanilla shake. My sister ordered a Mint Oreo shake and same thing she received a mint shake with a couple of pieces of Oreo on her whip cream. After we got our food we got home starving and ready to eat! The french fries were cold with NO flavoring, NO salt NO nothing. They were the worst fries I've ever had!!! Then we get the the burgers. The bread was saggy mush and the burger were bland and gross!!! Again they were cold! DO NOT GO HERE!!!!!

347cDXCzOCYxhC7tk3dKQQ.text: I absolutely love Steak n shake! I used to work at the one on South Blvd, so we frequently eat here alot. The biggest complaint I have though is the customer service.  Especially at night, everyone is rude. We don't go in and dine at night anymore, but instead just use the drive thru. Even though they don't do so well in the customer service department, I recommend going back just for the sake of their good food. They actually cook all their food fresh, instead of McDonald's for example. You won't be disappointed.

fnl3sMnN08U91BIAnr4oOA.text: This is not the first time I've been to the Steak N Shake I have been here with my family several times over the years needless to say service is never great but last night was the boiling point. We got to Steak N Shake around 7 o'clock pm and waited 30 minutes to be seated then waited another 15 minutes before anyone came and took our drink orders then waited 17 minutes before we got our milkshakes and another 22 before we got our food now you would think the restaurant was slam packed but it was not there were about four other tables than ours and about 15 people working. I do not know what the problem is other than the time the drive thru and it seems all of their concern for customer service goes to that because it's being reported back to their corporate office. By the time we got out it was after 9 p.m. and everyone was less than happy there was a line to speak to the manager as everyone in the restaurant was very upset with the quality of service. The food wasn't bad but with all of the frustration of service it's hard to enjoy so if you're looking for good food fast go somewhere else.

uYzzNwY5jTVS2Kn5z329SA.text: It pains me to give this Steak N' Shake a 2-star rating because I've been to it before when it first opened and it was great.  My experiences at other branches have also been decent.    It may have been the fact that we went there around 1030pm and there were only 2 servers/hostess.  There were plenty of tables, but we had to wait to be seated since many of the empty tables still had dirty dishes on them (still True after we sat at our table - they didn't clean the other tables off immediately).    The waitress, poor girl, was running around trying to get everyone.  She acknowledged us, but then took another 10-15 minutes to come back and take our orders.  The food arrived in a timely manner, but they only brought 2 of our 4 orders (missing bowl of chili and she totally forgot to put in hubby's cookies and cream milkshake).  My mom and hubby were almost done with their meals before I got my bowl of chili.  She was apologetic.  Then I noticed the table behind us had been waiting to get refills on their drinks for a while and after a point, the lady went up to the waitress herself and asked for a new drink.  She offered her a complimentary side of fries.  The only redeeming factor was the food.  It reminds me of back in high school when we would go to Steak N' Shake late at night after a movie.  They have delicious mocha shakes, chili mac, and the frisco melt.  I liked how they added a variety of slider flavors and keep increasing their milk shake offerings.  Their shoe-string fries have a nice crispy batter (and the portions are just right).  For a place that's opened 24-hours, they should consider hiring more staff to help on the floor.  It was pretty busy that night.  And please clean up the tables immediately after customers leave - it's pretty unappetizing to eat next to a table of dirty, used dishes.  Shoulda went to COOK-OUT across the street...

5hGdyX6lXgAqEvY84PVllw.text: Our server Haley definitely made it clear we were her last priority. After waiting about 20 minutes to even come to the table, she took our drink order and and didn't come back for 15 minutes at least. It was not even busy, maybe 4 other tables and 2 other servers. We were looking at her just standing there talking and not getting our drinks. She even Refilled a different tables drinks, then went back to talking to other workers before getting our drinks. It's too bad because we all really like steak and shake. The manager was just hanging out not very concerned that his restaurant has a lot of issues.

lZaBY8Nho4Y6Vz0amYSK1w.text: The waiter was super nice but it took so long to get some type of service. I am very disappointed. I give it 0 starts. Too bad I had to select at least one

zRg22iF8nY_tyTCORXNTsA.text: Avoid this location.  Service is very slow.  An hour after eating at this location, my entire family was nauseated.  The staff just tried to tell us it takes 24 hours to get sick which is a  load of crap.   The other locations around Charlotte are FAR better than this one.  Avoid!!!

GEvEiUtCxYYoWtBAOPZjKw.text: Worst customer service no matter what time of day. Always have to wait 10/15 minutes to get greeted, double that for food, I just walked out for the last time. The manager was on the floor performing an interview. Every table minus 5 not bused. Horrible establishment.

8rfmnGVjrkL7O6SEwokUKg.text: Always predictable food. It's steak and shake. Little slow with drive thru orders but usually ok and worth the wait.

X2ZbDjllIO7IN9rd1OAesQ.text: I still remember my very first Steak N Shake experience a couple years back (ok, it was probably more like a lot of years back).  The concept of shakes and hamburgers was very awesome to me.  Over the years, the chain has gotten bigger and changed somewhat... but they are still going strong.    This location is friendly and is a 24hr location.  Seems like their new promotion is a "Happy Hour" for shakes between 2-4pm and 2-4am!!!  It was almost tempting to try and come back a 2am...  but we decided to wise up a bit.  Food portions have fluctuated... so it seems like the portions are down a bit - but it's a good thing so that you don't feel over stuffed when leaving.  (you only have to run about 10 miles to burn all the calories instead of 26.2).

zcJKz2o7Xt6N1vV---G8Kw.text: Worst service ever waited an hour and no milkshake the food I got wasn't fresh and my boyfriend only ordered a milkshake never saw it and we're they sorry no other tables got milkshakes that ordered 15 minutes after us but our waitress ( same girl) kept saying ours were being made. We will never go back

E1LD-N1b8_E6SPhgpjR55w.text: The greatest service a human being could ask for! The manager Chris and the 2 servers Christie and Emma catered to my needs as a customer like I was a king (plus they aint bad lookin either ). A def 5/5, would recommend to friends and family. These guys deserve a raise!!

WEaXAauNlOKG1f3_76N28g.text: Not you average experience.   Come and plan to wait long times at the table.    Enjoy the views and wait long times to place drink orders.   Enjoy seeing wait staff walk around without taking your order.   Plan to spend an hour just to place and order once seated.

PMct_fCKxxtcQdeoxuxWmg.text: There is nothing bad to say about the food, drinks, staff, or even the bathrooms. The only thing is the manager at this location is a total jerk towards the employees. His name is Christopher. He should take social skill classes. Great place to eat and hang out with friends. The manger needs to treat his people with respect.

0ORdxcPBEa1iHAq84KFCzA.text: Stopped in for a quick lunch. That ended up not being the case. It appeared as though the staff were very new and lacked proficiency. Although the service was a little slow and awkward I had a good lunch. Kudos to the manager for jumping in to help his team when necessary. I will probably return in a few weeks and see if things have improved. I enjoy the food and especially the prices.

ENSVhY4ntu6eeuH0UY6QkA.text: Normally, I have no problems with this location but today was different. I pulled up to get my order which totaled out to be 11.81. In order to get less change back I gave the cashier 21.81. I got my order and pulled off. Being in a forgetful state, I realized I never got my change nor a receipt to state what I gave to the cashier. I had to return to the location and notify them. I was met with an employee who stated " I counted my drawer and it looks correct". I was then asked for the receipt I wasn't given which I informed her of. I noticed her looking at receipts that were crumbled up and she came across mine which stated I only gave her 11.81 which explains why I didn't get my change so I guess Steak n Shake was just going to keep my $10. Luckily, I got my change back but from now on I'll be sure to just pay with exact change at this location to avoid any confusion on behalf of your employees in the future with any of my transactions.

pMVPEOG1SYNIzgYXcPG7MA.text: I like this place! Dont go here late though, service is slow. 2 people working a full house every time I do go late night!

vjKyQgkW_kFALHhD1GDouA.text: My fist time here. My son's choice. Everything was good . Our server was super nice and informative . The food was as expected.

mKFAQcB98K0ZB4Jr22TETA.text: If I could give these people 0 stars I would. Worse service than McDonalds. I went through the drive thru placed my order and told to pull up behind the other pulled up vehicle (concrete median is the reason I didn't leave since I was stuck behind the other car. I waited nearly 25 minutes pulled up until I got out the car and went inside. Cashier told me the order was not put in and told to wait while she made it. Of course the order wasn't even right. There were so many employees (I saw at least 6 just in my line of view) yet only like 4-5 tables. Half the restaurant was cleared and the chairs were up on the tables. I can't believe I had to wait nearly 40 minutes at a supposed "fast food restaurant." I highly regret going there. Terrible experience.

D_BN3y3JU-9EoByOqn2lzA.text: WORST SERVICE EVER!!!! Our waitress messed up my girlfriends and I order as well as we made a separate order to go and totally forgot about it. DON'T COME HERE.

2Y-ZseB3ainzaPNHCfPliw.text: We sat down and waited for five minutes only to be completely ignored. Only one other table was seated so they weren't busy. We finally walked out. We won't be back. If I could give it half a star I would.

hmS-Gm3blH0XVfg8EjgMmw.text: We went in around 1130 pm. It took along time to even be acknowledged after we sat down. Once our waitress (Olivia) finally brought our food, we never saw her again. My date actually had to the window to get a server. We finally got a refill when we were ready to leave and we're done eating. Well, we went to the register to pay and then had to stand there another 5 minutes. REALLY. Finally the manager came and after we told her about it, she discounted our bill 5 dollars.  Well what a horrible experience and POOR customer service

Gn5ORHChDKBK2F-fxIILtA.text: Gave this place 2 tries..wasn't satisfied either visit. The service was slowly . Unbelievably slow. Place wasn't busy at all when we came in . The waitress just took her precious time walking around ..we didn't get to get refills on our drinks or anything bc she didn't come back around to our table after she brought the food out. Had to order our shakes to go at the front counter. And even those took close to 25 minutes to get . We watched a family come in and waited so long they sat themselves. And another couple come in and walked out once they stood there with no greeting for 10minutes . I would not recommend this place. Go to zaxbys next door

BgL4I3W3STezpoUA4YgQyw.text: Probably one of the most disfunctional experiences that I've had at a fast food/cook to order joint in a long time.    Went in for dinner on a date night.  Business was apparently good becuase there were barely any tables.  We were seated right away.  Looked around the restaurant and there were like 4-5 tables that needed to be bussed. (Great first impression).  Waitress came by and took our orders.  We ordered drinks and food at the same time so that we could get out in time for the movie.  We waited...and waited...and waited.  Watched food coming outnof the kitchen.  Others that came after us were being served.  2 waitresses came by and filled our drinks and kept reassuring us that our food would be there shortly.   Well, shortly never came.    45 minutes after we ordered,....still no food....and we missed the movie we had planned to attend.  We finally got up and walked out.  On the way out, I heard one of the servers yell to the manager "Table 13 is walking out".   Obviously they didnt care.   No one tried to stop us, apologize, or offer anything to make it right for us.  Steak and Shake was a real disappointment.   We ended up going next door to Zaxbys and had our food within 10 minutes.    What a waste of time.

yiDAexuVuqb4uMjNCKbIaw.text: The only reason this place received a three from me is due to the food. The service is comically bad, from terrible waitstaff,  being told there would be a twenty minute wait while in the drive thru (after waiting twenty minutes i was told it would be twenty more), order mix ups, the list goes on and on.   There have been a few times where i have brought my guests there for dinner and left ashamed of the service they provided. I love the food but everything else...wow. I think I'll take my money elsewhere until they get it together.

DCjC_12Cu0LcdgB2bRq7jg.text: We were looking for something to eat on Christmas Day. Very hungry we stopped in here.   Had the triple burger with heavy pickles and granddaughter had spicy chicken sandwich (too spicy to her) then got something to go for wife the 3 way chili to go. My god it was like a less than kids portion. It was for my wife.   The food while there and the waitress was great.   The service great.   I looked up a former review about the bathroom as well. The guy who wrote about the bathroom was not far from wrong. It needs to be cleaned badly taken care of hourly.   The portion size on their chili to go was seriously small,not worth the money.

GR8-fBq9sM2WChsjeiq6vw.text: I have been  told by many people that this is the place to get the best milkshakes. My fiance and I decided to go out and get some. We ordered our shakes through the drive-through.  We got to the window and were given our milkshakes. We drove off. But we soon realized Our milkshakes were both incorrect. One was banana and the other was mystery. Thank goodness  i'm not allergic to bananas. We drove back to have them redo our milkshakes. Well as my fiance was walking into the restaurant he dropped one of the milkshakes. Instead of bringing a messy cup into the restaurant he decided to just leave it there. He goes inside to try and tell them that the milkshakes were wrong and if they could please remake them. The lady at the counter told him that our milkshakes were correct. And she accused him of lying just so he could get two more milkshakes. (He brought the shakes back just so they would know we werent trying to hassle for free shakes even though we already paid for them) I do not always believe the saying that the customer is always right. But honestly it is a low thing to do to go in and try to lie about a milkshake out of all things just to get a free one. Wish we were treated better. Will not be coming back to this place again.

ZBcJhBgM1dDEjiF2x40q2A.text: This location gets he prize for worst service.  After repeated visits over two years the poor service has declined even further. This place ranks high only for consistency - albeit for bad service. We waited over 10 minutes for a waiter to approach us.    Of the five orders, four were wrong even though they were repeated.  We had to request silver twice.  And then had to again request a spoon for the chili.  The portion for the  Childs Mac was quite small.   One in our party ordered cottage cheese.  When the meals came he told us they don't carry it.  I asked what we could substitute and he was surprised that we would want an alternative side.    This isn't the first time we had the problem with cottage cheese at this location. They NEVER carry it at this location even though it stays on the menu. The meals took longer to arrive than at any other location in Georgia or Florida.  When we told our server that we wanted to order shakes he walked away.  Another server went to him to explain that we really wanted shakes.  He came over to ask if we really wanted to order.  I guess few people order shakes at Steak and Shake.    We like the chain but this location is so poor that we are unlikely to return.

laEL0K9Qt269up62zGHZCg.text: The food is good. Better than you'd expect even. But this is the third Steak 'N Shake that I've been to and each one has slow, slow service. I am giving up. I even came knowing its be slow. I had no place to be. I thought I could wait. But this visit was like the restaurant from hell. Except the food was good. I don't want to blame the servers as they seemed to always be working. But somehow the setup of the operation has refused to even try to learn anything about efficiency.

photos.caption: Photo of Steak ’n Shake - Charlotte, NC, United States. This is the line to check out!  Adding insult to injury after waiting 15 minutes for seating and 30 minutes for food.

ZsNZpXTZFPCgl-u_engl2Q.text: Chick-fil-A fries are better. They were also too skinny like ho back to mcdonalds where the food there and the food here have in common - they both taste like burnt crap

2gxaMTHY4akcSwVOkwZo6g.text: Pulled through the drive Thur & they said there was a "15 minute wait"... continued to wait and had terrible service.

x2UDi4rK2rX6v9Ch6E208Q.text: If I can give this place a negative rating, I would most definitely would. Tonight (07/28/17 @ 12:00 AM) is the third time we tried to dine in at this location and I don't even know why we keep giving it a try. First of all, the place was nowhere near being too busy. Sure there were diners but we should've have had to wait over 20 minutes to have a server come to our table. Well, 20 minutes passed and still nothing. The place is horrible. We've dined at daytime before and the service was good. The manager even looked right at us. Apparently it's more important to wipe tables than attend to diners at night here. I hope somebody from the company reads this comment and the other's bad reviews as well and hopefully take action. The place serves good food but their service really stinks. If you're only gonna provide good service at daytime, then maybe they should just NOT have it open 24 hours if the night staff won't be willing to work at all.

02NEaludFM9FOL77mpNv1A.text: Walked out.... 10 minutes passed drink order wasn't even taken!  Don't waste your time!!!!!!

NfEcSXo17xGi2J68HYsjKQ.text: They are SLOW.  I was seated immediately and ordered right after I was seated.  People started to trickle in little by little (probably due to after club hours), but I had already placed my order.  After twenty minutes of waiting, a table that came in after I did got their food first.    All I ordered was a mushroom portobello burger combo and my friend didn't order anything.  Okay, so the table that came in ten minutes after us got their food first, maybe my order was already ready and needed to be served out?  Five minutes later, nothing.  We walked out.  Not coming back to this one again.

5wXHMulYsfdhfXdhomcb7Q.text: If I could give this place 0 stars I would. Fucking embarrassingly bad and ghetto, rude service. Pull up to the window late night (around 1:45am). I'm greeted with "Yo.. I'll be wit u n a minute." Thirty seconds later... "it gon be like 15-20 minute before u get service, we got 5 tickets in the dining and we have to get that done first." Wow, what the actual fuck? But I say that's fine and I politely wait. And I wait. And I FUCKING WAIT. Finally, after 25 minutes.. I simply put the car in reverse and roll back the forward. And I'm again greeted with, "Yo.. I'll be with you n a minute." A few more moments go by.. I been her 30 minutes at this point might as well wait it out right? Ha, jokes on me man! FINALLY I get some sort of half ass service.. I ask for 2 banana shakes and a large fry. The response? "Ah man, if I had known you wanted a shake I would have been had told you to pull off.. our shake machine is broke." Are you fucking with me steak and shake? You've got to be fucking kidding me. This is literally the worst service that I have ever received anywhere and I've worked in the restaurant industry for 8 years now. I will never again eat this restaurant. You should be beyond ashamed of yourselves and embarrassed treating customers like that. WOW!

77Z8EmwwQVWDwfb6XBuK5w.text: A "can't believe it" experience.  Cottage cheese is on the menu.   They are ALWAYS out.  The manager says he doesn't order it because he has to buy too much and it goes to waste.  So order smaller?  He says corporate won't let him.  So why not take it off the menu if you're NEVER going to have it.   I gave 2 stars solely because of a great server, Jeremy, who stood out at a location that is typically VERY slow.  I wish I could give more but the kitchen is always slow, the manager can't control stock and all prior visits have taken well over an hour to get a burger.  My family warned me not to order dessert because "that always takes as long as the time to prepare the dinner order."  Again Jeremy was better at this as well but he remains the sole good example of an otherwise poorly run franchise location.

_hNxJfkRUsCCU3XmmWoo5Q.text: The line took forever, order and pay for our food just to be pulled up to the stop sign. Cars behind us got their food but were stuck because we were still waiting. Finally get the food and head home. Get here and the fry cups are only a quarter full. My son's kids meal had more fries than the 3 adult meals. The burgers weren't right and everything had a layer of grease. The cups all had drink running down the side. Poor service, bad food, DONT DO IT!

photos.caption: Photo of Steak ’n Shake - Charlotte, NC, United States

wzrWHHGgXdN49b72v39_Dg.text: Had lunch here today.  The burger was good, service was good.  But it is a good thing I ate before going into the Men's room.  Talk about disgusting!   You know that corner of the building, behind the dumpster, where the homeless guys always urinate?   Well, that corner is less revolting than this restaurant's men's bathroom.  This was the worst, nastiest, most disgustingly unclean restaurant bathroom I have encountered in Charlotte.  And I have lived here for 38 years.  Makes me wonder just how wholesome the food is if the bathroom is so unsatisfactory.  I will not return to this restaurant.

tpAa0B1buEKqpXTI8QhnLQ.text: Terrible service. Instead of seating us, these two employees decided to argue in front of customers! Didn't care what so ever.

Nr8jD4OqeWAlt6LET2lT1A.text: Tried this place for the 1st time today. Not a good experience. Ordered 2 patty melt combos, a banana shake, and a Bacon N' Cheese Double. The shake was free because we had a coupon, but we actually ended up paying for it anyway because we never got the Bacon N Cheese Double. Drive thru service at the Sardis Road location sucks. We were never given a receipt so I could not prove anything. I called the store back and spoke with a manager named Rodger.  He offered a free meal for our next trip, but I would have to write his name on the receipt or a random piece of paper and present it to someone who probably wouldn't believe me. They got me, but I won't be back. Oh and my fries were cold. My house guess didn't have anything to eat, so we had to go back out to McDonalds. My total came up to $21.93.

m01xLiOTKvofaVQ3RINsTA.text: Very nice people and decent food. Especially for the price. A little slow to bring the food and it isn't always the cleanest.

g_4WfmiGjtxsN2rJT5ZOtw.text: The drive thru was so terrible that after 30 minutes of waiting for our food, we went in and were told that our order was never put in, even though there were many people working and the inside of the restaurant was nearly empty. We were not offered a refund either, and were told to wait even longer for them to make our food.

4BgLLniUN4GllcbNCF9Y7A.text: I love that they are open when I get off my late night shift but over the last 4 visits I've asked for a milkshake no cherry due to allergies. And Everytime I get a cherry I know it's late at night and working in the restaurant industry myself it can get stressful but a food allergy is serious stuff

clDbhVMStifYaOOLp8MGGw.text: Been here twice -- once in the afternoon and once late at night -- and haven't had the problems others have reported. Service has been fast and friendly and the food good. I've had a burger and fries and a shake both times and can't complain.

-cKbkbtwGXXqa8qrOmiLpw.text: We waited 20 minutes just to be seated at a table and then another 20 just to be asked what drinks we would like and if we were ready to order. Our waitress was clearly high and blind to all the trash piled up on the tables. Food wasn't awful, just a little cold, but that was to be expected considering it sat on the waiting table for 10 minutes while our waitress hid in the back and did nothing. All in all, what was supposed to be a 45 minutes trip turned into a two hour trip.

w6P4w1xGYYshXhU6lUBGVA.text: This place is a joke. We waited easily 20 minutes to PLACE an order at the front desk. The cook clearly hates working here, and with an attitude told us it would a while before we were helped. Finally another staff person came over and took our order. The cook decided to take a break after we placed order and disappeared to back for at least 5 minutes. The workers all seem like they hate customers and working together. Food is decent though, once you shave years off your life waiting for it.

nnP8c5kggA9xqfHXAcWpeg.text: This may be the worst Steak and Shake location in the country. We're from Florida and loved SnS there.  I've been to this location three times now because I assumed that they were just having an off day during my prior visits.   The burgers are always over cooked and over seasoned. The fries are cold. We ordered a salad and cup of chili which were brought after our meal was completed. Our to go order was wrong. The bathroom was disgusting.   On a positive note, our server was very sweet.

KtLOpFhOYzGgAgUHSyZvzA.text: They failed to tell us that when you get a single patty for the guacamole burger all you get is a patty, cheese, guacamole, and a bun....no vegetables or sauce that's it. The wait time was pretty long for how dead it was too but other than that the food was decent

i_7vIUt0mlI7ILmj9RkwOA.text: Exceptional service for even the toughest of customers. We were greeted with a smile and told the waitress we were in a rush. She took our orders and immediately put our orders in. Our food was hot and out in 5 minutes. The milkshake came out and we told them we needed it to go. With took it and even put fresh whipped cream and a cherry on top. This is the best Steak N Shake I have ever been too.

BLc1Vn8UTlcFZhez9KMJow.text: Food took to long , server went on a smoke break while serving us . This is ridiculous.

aPSyZLjIYBQvFOqJAKsDbw.text: Besides the place being open 24 hours, and the food being ok... This is by far the worst steak and shake location I've ever been to. Who the heck wants to go to a fast food place to wait 20 minutes at the damn speaker "I'll be right with you." Then come back 20 minutes later to rudely take my order. Now- I'm curious how long it's going to take to actually get my food!

q4Gy1TxMEsmDNfqvij038g.text: Laziest staff I have EVER encountered. We have came here 4 times in the last month & have walked out every single time. The staff will completely ignore you. We waited over 15 minutes with there only being 3 tables of people. This restaurant is always completely disgusting. The parking lot always smells like vomit as well. We went to leave to go take our business elsewhere and passed one of the cooks who was outside getting stoned! The entryway smelled like straight pot! Absolutely repulsive not to mention ILLEGAL! Do not eat here. Period.

KBNfROjOpoPm9YCKdhWA9w.text: This place sucks! Terrible service and long waits. Every time I go there the waiters are never actually there to provide service for me, and I have to wait an extremely long time to actually get my food/drinks!

vvxP90C5NlQNqBeGvjfNJw.text: Staff is soooo slow, not even busy, takes 20 minutes to get order taken, 2nd time here this week, MISTAKE, will not be back for a long time, they need new staff. Takes too long to eat here! A couple got up and left while I was waiting as well, losing business for yourselves as well! Need management here at all times that actually care about customers and realize why they are here.

yWOZfxEYFuJOwo0bCsOZeQ.text: Avoid at all costs. Cockroaches in building (discovered as we were leaving). Extremely poor management and staffing. My husband and I waited 10 minutes to be seated while the manager bussed tables despite that there were more than enough clean to have seated us. We ordered a bowl of chili, two orders of fries, and two milkshakes. It took over 35 minutes to be served. There were only 13 customers in the restaurant. The service was awful. I almost feel bad saying that the manager, Jen, has no business working in a management position because she is clearly a hard worker and ... It is just a fast food restaurant. But, if this was my business (it would never have gotten this bad), I would want to know. This manager clearly had no clue how to effectively task her staff, manage her own time, or how to interact with customers. I didn't even bother speaking with her about, it would've been pointless.

3p-ilIpPkyHECfh6MoIRhQ.text: Waited 45 minutes in the drive through, then recived cold food and the wrong shake.  Terrible customer service!

hsr757hDtvUwR0vsn4KHeQ.text: My family and I went to steak and shake last weekend on Sunday in between meals so it wasn't terribly busy and the service was absolutely horrible.  We sat at a table for over 15 minutes w/o a single server coming to take our drink or or anything.  Servers were walking by our table many times and checking on other tables after they were already tended to but would not wait on us. Even when we got up to leave no one seemed to care. We went next door to Board Walk Billies and had WONDERFUL service and great food.  It was so much better than the mess they would of served us at Steak and Shake.  I honestly think it was a race thing and that is why they didn't wait in us.

oCF7iPF92_GQ8yys9QkhFg.text: Don't waste your time. I had to wait for my food, which I don't mind. But on top of that When I got it , it wasn't well cooked. Also my fries were greasy, and I barely got any.  I asked the girl who brought my food if she could wait until I checked my order, she said no. If there was something wrong with it I could go inside, I thought that was the point of drive through so I wouldn't have to go inside. Never again. So dumb.

sxcrLlhsy8l2jntVfbt3Ww.text: To use FREE Steak 'n Shake Wi-Fi you must download Yelp, seriously?  And their Wi-Fi is so weak you can't use it?  Jocelyn was our waitress and she did an awesome job!  Food was hot/drinks as ordered - fairly priced and the app makes paying a breeze.  Do yourself a favor, don't even think of going into that pigstye of a bathroom!  Does make you worry about the kitchen sanitation?

03ghbtMXoS4XNGBfculkdg.text: when will this place ever get a health score that is respectable enough to want to eat here. Again a 92, come on guys. Do love the vanilla cokes though.

MMWZ_1ao4JL2bBZbt80Cog.text: I got a number 15 and waited 15 minutes for the worse burger I ever had. The meat was cold and had holes in it so you could see the bacon on the other side. The hamburger bun was wet and soggy. The french fries were cold and greasy. The manager at the window had a nonchalant attitude.

Y6JByiBlA9pPafdJ1vngyQ.text: My husband and I waited for 18 minutes in the car before we got our order.  When we got home,  It was ALL wrong,.  We called the manager  thinking we might have had a mix up.  We got nothing but attitude.  We couldn't even eat what we DID get because it was soaked in grease. I filled quarter of a cereal bowl with the grease from our  2 burgers!! I would never eat that.  Why would I let my children eat that?  Bad attitude,  wrong order,  bad food.  Even Burger King tries to help you when they screw up,  not Steak and Shake on Sardis Rd., Charlotte, NC.  They will just say,  "Oh,  really? . Is there anything else I can help you with?"   Are you serious?

Jmyyv6L1xEWxmBOHRQyefg.text: Very clean and friendly service. Waiter hooked it up with free drinks. Went during lunch hour 1:00 pm.

YMua2ZE-v8MnKu-ywTFPBA.text: I cant remember the last time I was here but u gave it 1 star. With all the tv ads I decided to try it again. And immediately I know why I gave 1 star. Service is terrible from the moment you walk in. Plan on waiting to get seated,  order taken, and eating. I wouldn't at all be surprised if the DMV managed this place. And make sure what ever your order has at least 2 patties or you'll never see the meat.     I dont believe I will be updating this place again.

rFVpjClzsQyHVOaBAUnaZA.text: Nothing like waiting in the always long drive thru lane ... 10+ plus minutes and they still screw up your order./   this is when they don't tell u that the drive thru is closed and you need to come in ..   There's a couple of great people here ... but a lot of slackers that don't greet you or say hello or thank you and USUALLY get your order wrong .   One time a guy didn't give me my change and told me it's only .33...! So is he just keeping all the change?  Lol

photos.caption: Photo of Steak ’n Shake - Charlotte, NC, United States. Yes looks like what I ordered.. mustard and onions only.   But NO ONIONS and LOTS of ketchup!  it&#39;d be funny if this wasn&#39;t the norm here
Photo of Steak ’n Shake - Charlotte, NC, United States. Footlong with mustard and onions  June 21, 2018
Photo of Steak ’n Shake - Charlotte, NC, United States. June 21, 2018

USX_53MPBWeUPiiJVqiCXQ.text: Called the number posted here on 7/21/19 - Yep we are open!  Did not occur to me to confirm that the number wasn't forwarded from the closed location to the open one in Pineville.  Went to Cookout because the location we asked about wasn't open as confirmed.

JGd6EOO3I4AJ98rF-CxR_Q.text: Walked in at 8 pm on a Monday. I can count 7 tables that havent had the food and drink cleaned off of them. It's 842 pm. Our order just got taken 10 mins ago. Those tables are still sitting there not cleaned. One waitress. Women's bathroom was so disgusting that my wife wouldn't use it. I checked the men's and she used that one because it had one stall that was actually clean. The women's had urine all over the toilets. Toilet paper EVERYWHERE. Sink was disgusting. Men's wasn't much better but at least one toilet was decent. Floors are sticky.  So, now it's 850 and we still haven't gotten our water.   In the meantime, I'm looking around. The inside and outside of the windows are FILTHY. There is no way that the store manager or franchise owner ever comes to this store.   855 pm. Still no water.  Ooohhhh. 857 water got here.   859 food got here. At least that was at a decent wait time.   I will never come back to this place.

lQP44JZyd7lgZG0P04D8FA.text: If you don't want to read, a few key words; LAZY, DISRESPECTFUL , UNSANITARY, lack of Motivation, and Pride. !Warning! at this Location  Experience:  1230am Drive Thru, worker says it's gonna be a 20m wait because of a shift change. I drove 15m out of the way to get S&S so I decided to walk inside.  Waiting... waiting...oh hey.  I'm interrupted by another customer she says there food took about an hour and was told it was because the ticket was lost, she asked if she could be compensated with a discount. They said the ticket was actually found and she ate the food. Goodbye. They leave. They continue to say how she's Larger and doesn't need to eat those fries anyway or something of that nature. (Red Flag)!   Back to me, I proceed to order adamant for a burger and something light for my friend in the car. I'm told there's almost no food in house in a way it seemed like I was being very "Inconvenient" to them, (no eggs, salad, soup, noodles, chili.. etc)  About over 1/3 of the menu. I ask for a burger and a sandwich thankfully they had.  Waiting.... look Around at the trash on the floor, the server drinking a milkshake leaning on the drink machine, boxes and trash in the back, food and shit on most of the tables in the "closed section". Just a pathetic seen.  I get my food to go in an average time. (Felt lied to about the drive thru*) just to get me to leave? 8 mins later I open my poorly put together burger that just falls apart, basically mush. *Overcharged for a combo I didn't get by the way*  Fries tasted like they had been having a damn fish fry all day.   I'm surprised that there even in business. Whole staff needs to be either replaced or retrained. Management doesn't seem to give a damn. I hope they close down soon. The Franchise owner needs to do some soul searching or get a different profession so not terrorize the rest of the community with there poor management.  This isn't a complaint, it's a Warning for other Customers. Some drastic changes need to be made at this location.

Gg3qAKQrcSUUipL5rBFDlQ.text: Worst manager ever! Fire her! Ignored us for 10 minutes! Then when we said something she told us it wasn't her job to seat us and the server will seat us when they can! Will not be back to this location! Bad bad attitude!

YRHZpx_9Vy0_qyp2CBhEXg.text: Literally the worst place ever. I have multiple complaints from one 15 minute visit.  Went through the drive thru & they had a lady pull up & wait for f*cking milkshakes. As a result, me & the guy ahead of me couldn't pull out, so he got a worker's attention & had them come outside to ask her to move. The worker literally started arguing with the man & said "well if she pulls up, how are you gonna get out?" Girl....what? That's exactly how a drive thru works.   The girl at the window was literally shoving food into her mouth & smacking so f*cking loud. She didn't even seem to care that people were aware of her eating...while handing out food.   I've noticed all Steak & Shake's I go to are absolutely horrifying, disgusting, full of rude workers & pointless waits for minimal items, but this one is the winner.

bTpehtjnm_8QJSWNpNRs-g.text: My favorite burgers in town...however, this place has THE WORST service and wait times of any food establishment in the history of western civilization. It is unfortunate, because the food is so tasty...  There is almost a 100% chance that they will either make you wait 25-30 minutes for a take-out/drive-thru order when it's super slow (I've waited over an hour for one to-go burger on nights when they're busy, no joke), or that they will almost for sure mess up your order (charge extra for something not ordered, forget to give you something that you had paid for, incorrectly prepare your burger, with ingredients that you had asked to be left off)...  Of the last 5 attempted visits, over the last few months...2 times, I was informed that they could not serve food, because not enough employees had shown up for their shift, and 2 other times, I was informed that it would be a 30-minute wait for a burger (with no other guests there)  Worst ran business in America!

XW2pgMDcs0y5W0a7CHDQtA.text: After hoping to go to South 21 for dinner, we found out that it was closed for vacation, so my family and I decided to stop at Steak & Shake and were not all that disappointed until after we ordered. After 10 minutes of waiting for drinks to arrive my mom got a diet Pepsi in about 10 times as long as it should've taken and another 15 to 20 minutes until we got our food with a messed up order that was not even fixed by the staff after being asked twice and all the while my sister could see hers and my shakes melting on a counter less than 10 feet away from our table which when we finally got our shakes they were basically flavored milk.  All and all it was a pretty appalling visit to Steak & Shake and I would not recommend this location since my mom walked out with an empty stomach and my sister and I walked out with an unpleasant experience.  That being said, I give this location two stars out of five because the management did reconcile their mistakes by giving us a discount on our meals and by explaining that the server has had numerous complaints from other customers.

y0CJ964e_bvwMC0QmQv1Aw.text: Here to join the long list of other people who had a poor experience here. This is probably the worst steak and shake I've ever been to. The quality of service is awful. A lady who worked there standing outside of the diner said we couldn't come in to eat even though we arrive 30 mins before "closing" -- it's a 24/7 diner. She complained how she didn't want to take us in and work overtime even though we were there well before closing. She wasted our time and gas coming here. If you think steak and shake is 24/7 and a great place for a late night meal think again.

NlXQnzq9R69KrB0ceSj28g.text: I really like the burgers at steak and shake and I'm usually drive-through person but I was shocked and appalled and disgusted to go into my steak and shake today on a Sunday evening at after 8 o'clock because the parking lot was full of trash & the front area was covered in trash... the bushes even have trash in them and to walk inside the restaurant there is even trash all over the floor especially in front of the kitchen window. It's the first thing you see when you walk in: my entire line of sight was full of trash on the ground it's disgusting! And the servers are standing there in front of the window waiting for things and are too damn lazy to reach down and pick up the trash. I've watched them all walk by or just stay in there over at doing nothing when all I have to do is reach 10 and pick up their damn mess. I ran restaurants for years and yes this is fast food but none of the other fast food restaurants like Zaxby's next-door has trash in their parking lot or in their bushes that I can see. This is bad management. And it Would appear staff Just does not take very much pride in anything they do. I hope they don't keep their homes this way.   Did I not love their jalapeno crunch burger and hotdogs they would not get three stars... Really trashy filthy and I'm watching servers or staff be on their phone sending texts in the beverage area instead of picking up all that garbage under their feet!

q0GRxN-t7ShQFEldmpzwZw.text: We love Steak 'n Shake food but have traditionally experienced poor service, no matter where we were traveling. We we pleasantly surprised to be seated right away, all of the guests had been served and eating and we were greeted by Shikari Adkins shortly after we were seated. We got our food in a timely manner AND our orders were all correct... just as we ordered!!!  Apparently the owner(s) are rectifying all of the problems we read about. Thanks for the great dining experience Shikari!!!

5_CD_-SHuHiWmLVFju1n8Q.text: I love steak n shake, they have great food and great service! I love the garlic steak burger I swear I could eat one everyday if I could lol.

photos.caption: Photo of Steak ’n Shake - Charlotte, NC, United States. So damn good #garlicsteakburger #bestburgerever

k7LFNU6COoM0kPX20aJVDA.text: I went here with my little brother because he loves this place. We walked in around 3:40pm so it wasn't busy at all, there was barely anyone there. It took them 10 minutes to get us seated and we weren't even greeted by the hostess or server. A family of five was seated before us and we walked in before them. When we finally got seated the lady threw the menus on the table and didn't tell us who our server was... a couple of moments later someone finally came up to the table took our drink order. We order 2 milkshakes. A couple of minutes later (no milkshakes in her hand) she came back and took our order for our food(both order burgers).   The food came out before the shakes and that took at least 20 minutes. I know it takes a while to cook food but that was a little insane when it wasn't even busy(there were only 3 other tables that were seated out of the restaurant and everyone already had their food). My burger wasn't even hot and I asked our server about our shakes And she didn't say anything. Our shakes finally arrived 25 minutes after we ordered them. Needless to say I won't be back. Don't waste our money at this one. Takes a long time to get what you ordered.

V0L0zzdODAbCes6i4bilEg.text: Never place an online order. My 2 burgers were supposed to be ready by 1:46pm. I showed up to the drive thru at that exact time and was told that I have to go inside to pick up my order, which I've never had to do before. I go inside and wait 10 minutes for someone to help me. I tell the person I have an online order and they say that they will begin to make it right away. I explain it should've already been made. They say nothing and walk away. The manager finally gets me my food after seeing me waiting and I show him my online order. I had to wait 20 minutes for food that should have been ready.

4Ka3W-U1FvEg3-F5lUNOSg.text: I had 1 of the absolute worst experience ever at this location a few months ago! the manager and her asst.. (2 heavyset Caucasian females) were the the absolute rudest!! they apparently became upset with me because I made a gesture at the manager  because as she brought the icecream we ordered to the table, she was observed by me talking OVER the food as she was trying to decide which table to bring it to. I was with 3 kids under the age of 5! I didn't realized the manager had an attitude with me until it was time for me to pay the bill. I asked why was she looking at me in such an aggressive manner.. she replied because "I am about sick of you and I need you to Pay and get out now!." I was totally shocked and said "how dare you speak to me in that manner and demand money from me".. she then started threatening to call the cops on us. the kids started crying! I became upset at the tone she was using and asked to speak to her manager.. at this time another heavy set Caucasian woman who stood next to her said.."I am the manager and she had done nothing wrong, pay your bill and leave the store please" the 2 of them were talking to me so disrespectful, I was trying to keep a hold of my composure as I was with 3 babies who were pulling me to just leave because they were scared to death after hearing these obnoxious women continue to threaten me with the cops... I told her I was going to pay and as I handed her the slip with what I had ordered  she snatched it along with the money  I had in my hand  and threw it back at me and said leave. I said this is not my receipt, this is the same slip I gave you ( mind you she never rung up my order in the cash register...she said yes it is.. now GO!" as I was trying my best to stay calm in front if the kids, telling them to not be afraid she said "I am sick of you" and started acting as if she was speaking to an officer giving him a description of me. I stated "ok I will wait outside for the cops to come because  this cannot be happening and I want to speak to the cops too.... sitting near the register there was a dark skin female employee (skinny) sitting down laughing along with the entire crew that was on shift that day. I said to her.. "wow and your actually laughing thinking its cute for your leaders to react like this" she responded "bitch I am not the one don't say shit to me because I am not my manager and youre just mad that shes cursing you out".... so I walked out and went to my car to wait for the police. the skinny girl ran towards the back and came back with a brown skin rugged looking thugged out guy.. he went to his car and grabbed something and put it in his pants. he started waving saying for me to come on over here (as I stood by my car) he kept saying "I got something for you!" they all were laughing through the door.. I got in the car and left because I wasnt sure What he had put in his pants from the car that was parked on the right side of the front entrance... . I called the cops as I drove away and gave them a description of what had happened. I was in tears! I called the cooperate office and gave them the girls names (i cant remember the names now) and my information and a detailed report of what had happened. Cooperate never called me back. it is now months later and just writing this review makes me sick! I will be able to provide the day ..it  was Feb 3, 2019.. it was in the afternoon towards evening...the absolute WORST fast food Experience Ever!!

jT-AlvXxO_caNfabeTluPw.text: Someone get that manager. She's so disrespectful. This lady that was in front of us cussed her out because she was giving us attitude. It took 10 minutes to get sat. This place does not have there priorities in order. Terrible. Good food though lol! :)

RgThBkZTLxx6SNXIcx6axA.text: Came in after a fun night. Table was dirty with ketchup stains. We disregard and asked for it to be clean. Ordered two meals a chicken tender mean with an additional of fries.. well the fries came out when my fiance was actually done her food.  Not to mention we never even received the cookie that came with the meal. And still paid full price. I am absolutely disgusted especially when I watched my fiance fries sit in the window while the waitress spend an indecent amount of time joking around with the table that was in front of us. So I asked the cook to bring my fries. Then on my check out expressed my concerned with did me little to no good. I should have walked out on the fucking tab. This is the first time in history I have never tipped because of the service.

vflKrS_en13T8kOhBQD9Zw.text: The service was inattentive and slow. I could overlook our bad experience, but the worst part was what happened to another group. A group of 5 people came in- looked to be a mom, teenager and 3 elementary age kids. They came in and missed reading the small sign about waiting for a seat, so they seated themselves at a table. My first jobs were a hostess and server at a restaurant, so I understand that it probably gets annoying having to explain this to people 20 times a day. Well, our server had clearly had enough. He ranted about this to us and proceeded to ignore them. After about 10 minutes, they got up and left. The mom was wearing a hijab and I really hope she didn't misunderstand the incident. The guy wasn't being racist, he was just being an asshole. I would've said something to a manager, but really don't think it would have made a difference.
